issues.shortMessage: Method "Lambda" has 8 parameters, which is greater than the 7 authorized.
issues.fullMessage: A long parameter list can indicate that a new structure should be created to wrap the numerous parameters or that the function is doing too many things.

properties.title: Methods should not have too many parameters
